explains: [医][食品] 杀菌；使不孕；无用状态
wordGroup: disinfection and sterilization 消毒和灭菌
sterilization operation [医]绝育手术；[金融]本外币对冲操作

sentences.en: Compulsory sterilization represented social engineering of the worst sort.
sentences.cn: 强制性绝育象征着社会工程的最低手段。

sentences.en: For men vasectomy is the only option for sterilization.
sentences.cn: 对于男性来讲，输精管结扎术是唯一的绝育手术。

sentences.en: For men, vasectomy is the only option for sterilization.
